title: (x) Feb 6th 1958 Munich - similar to P22 Johnson Underground {Stephen}
content:
Howdi folks,

Wondered if anyone would be so kind as to have a go at IDing this one?

Its from a very old clock.

Thanks in advance.

GT

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151930im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/munich_6331.png)

 [‹ (x) Walbaum with sharper serifs - ITC Fenice {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151930/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40828 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Alberta" 70s style logo - Nordic {Sander de Voogt} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151930/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40842 "Go to next forum topic")
author: G T

comments.content: Likely hand lettered. [P22 Johnson Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151930/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/p22/p22_johnston_underground_bold/?sample_text=FEB%20MUNICH&sample_size=48&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) comes close.
